actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.

official_title: To require each post office of the United States Postal Service to display the official portrait of the President and the Vice President.
short_title: Postal Operations To be Unbiased and Sensible (POTUS) Act of 2018

summary.text:
Postal Operations To be Unbiased and Sensible (POTUS) Act of 2018

This bill requires the U.S. Postal Service to require post offices to display the official portraits of the President and Vice President.

titles.title: To require each post office of the United States Postal Service to display the official portrait of the President and the Vice President.
